rules_text: At the beginning of your end step, you may sacrifice another permanent. If you do, search your library for a permanent card with the same mana cost as that card plus an additional {1}, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. [i](Mana cost includes color. For example, if you sacrifice a permanent with mana cost {2}{W}{B}, search for a permanent with mana cost {3}{W}{B}.)[/i]
